lines: By mutual confidence and mutual aid great deeds are done, and great discoveries made.
author: <Author:0x00007f67ae157b48>

lines: There are always new things to find out if you go looking for them.
author: <Author:0x00007f67adee9410>

lines: The real voyage of discovery consists of not in seeking new landscapes but in having new eyes.
author: <Author:0x00007f67aed4fd60>

lines: I close my eyes to old ends. And open my heart to new beginnings.
author: <Author:0x00007f67ae8d67e8>

lines: Reach high, for stars lie hidden in your soul. Dream deep, for every dream precedes the goal.
author: <Author:0x00007f67aec84408>

lines: No winter lasts forever; no spring skips it's turn.
author: <Author:0x00007f67ae89a888>

lines: What a wonderful thought it is that some of the best days of our lives haven't even happened yet.
author: <Author:0x00007f67adf15100>

lines: Joy is the holy fire that keeps our purpose warm and our intelligence aglow.
author: <Author:0x00007f67adeff990>

lines: If you carry joy in your heart, you can heal any moment.
author: <Author:0x00007f67ae870e98>

lines: A joy shared is a joy doubled.
author: <Author:0x00007f67ae8ab020>

lines: The joy of giving is the greatest joy of life.
author: <Author:0x00007f67adf3cc78>

lines: Joy is a decision, a really brave one, about how you are going to respond to life.
author: <Author:0x00007f67adf261f8>

lines: Joy is what happens to us when we allow ourselves to recognize how good things really are.
author: <Author:0x00007f67adedb9a0>

lines: Change in all things is sweet.
author: <Author:0x00007f67adec9d90>

lines: A bend in the road is not the end of the road unless you fail to make the turn.
author: <Author:0x00007f67adeb3e28>

lines: No matter who you are, no matter what you did, no matter where you’ve come from, you can always change to become a better version of yourself.
author: <Author:0x00007f67aea3d848>

lines: Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself.
author: <Author:0x00007f67aea27b38>

lines: We all have big changes in our lives that are more or less a second chance.
author: <Author:0x00007f67ae856020>

lines: Don’t ever let a soul in the world tell you that you can’t be exactly who you are.
author: <Author:0x00007f67ae83faf0>

lines: Put all excuses aside and remember this: You are capable.
author: <Author:0x00007f67ae82dad0>

lines: Always be a first-rate version of yourself and not a second-rate version of someone else.
author: <Author:0x00007f67ae9140e8>

lines: What lies behind us and what lies before us are small matters compared to what lies within us.
author: <Author:0x00007f67ae8fe888>

lines: Your self-worth is determined by you. You don’t have to depend on someone telling you who you are.
author: <Author:0x00007f67aeb00f28>

lines: We must take care of our families wherever we find them.
author: <Author:0x00007f67aeaeb2e0>

lines: Family is not an important thing. It's everything.
author: <Author:0x00007f67aead8d48>

lines: Family and friendships are two of the greatest facilitators of happiness.
author: <Author:0x00007f67aeb23370>

lines: The most important thing in the world is family and love.
author: <Author:0x00007f67aeb118f0>

lines: Family and friends are hidden treasures, seek them and enjoy their riches.
author: <Author:0x00007f67ae6c7448>

lines: The more grateful I am, the more beauty I see.
author: <Author:0x00007f67ae6b5ae0>

lines: Gratitude unlocks the fullness of life. It turns what we have into enough, and more.
author: <Author:0x00007f67aece7c38>

lines: As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them.
author: <Author:0x00007f67aecd6118>

lines: Showing gratitude is one of the simplest yet most powerful things humans can do for each other.
author: <Author:0x00007f67aecc4670>

lines: Start each day with a positive thought and a grateful heart.
author: <Author:0x00007f67aea7ae00>
